<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Transform all store nodes into one single node because</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0, e = RVLocs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>(); i != e; ++i) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Copy the result values into the output registers.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
